right-mintydocs-editlive: Edit MintyDocs pages that have a corresponding draft page
action-mintydocs-editlive: edit MintyDocs pages that have a corresponding draft page
mintydocs-noparentpage: Error: Every $1 page must be a subpage.
mintydocs-invalidparentpage: Error: The page "$1" must be a $2 page.
mintydocs-product-versionlist: Click on any of the following to see the documentation for that version:
mintydocs-version-desc: This is the documentation for version $1 of $2.
mintydocs-version-manuallist: Here are the manuals for this version:
mintydocs-manual-desc: This manual is for version $1 of $2.
mintydocs-manual-otherversions: Read this manual for other versions:
mintydocs-topic-desc: This topic is part of the manual $1 for version $2 of $3.
mintydocs-topic-otherversions: Read this topic for other versions:
mintydocs-publish-success: The following pages will be created or modified: $1.
mintydocs-createdraft-success: The following draft pages will be created: $1.
mintydocs-copy-success: The following pages will be copied: $1.
apihelp-mintydocspublish-summary: Publishes a MintyDocs page by copying it from the draft namespace to the main namespace.
apihelp-mintydocspublish-param-title: The name of the page to publish
apihelp-mintydocspublish-example-title: Copy the contents of the page Draft:ABC123 to the page ABC123
